titleStmt.title: The declaration of His Excellency the Lord General Fairfax, and his General Councel of officers, shewing the grounds of the Armies advance towards the City of London. By the appointment of His Excellency the Lord Fairfax, Lord General, and his General Councel of officers, held at Windsor, Nov. 30. 1648. Signed, John Rushvvorth, Secr'
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.

titleStmt.title: The declaration of His Excellency the Lord General Fairfax, and his General Councel of officers, shewing the grounds of the Armies advance towards the City of London. By the appointment of His Excellency the Lord Fairfax, Lord General, and his General Councel of officers, held at Windsor, Nov. 30. 1648. Signed, John Rushvvorth, Secr'
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for John Partridge,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Dec:"; 'Novemb.' in imprint has been crossed out.
